column4: hey, can anyone help me get my laptop to the right resolution, It worked with 5.10 but this new version has streched 1024px instead of its true screen wxga size
there is no option to make the screen resolution higher than 1024px x 768
is this a fault with xorg?
upen up the terminal the cd to /etc/X11
the do sudo vim xorg.conf and add the resolution by hand
or just go into the terminal and do sudo dpkg reconfigure xorg
